fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a target and up to two words. Tonight, their actions will be processed as if any instance of those words in their abilities/attributes was removed.
- Dream big, doing the same thing as your first ability but instead allowing you to select up to five words. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your ability uses can't be Rule 17'd.
- You may not self-target.
